attributes.action: reward Hugh Laurie with a Kniighthood for services to acting and the promotion of britishness over seas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hugh haurie has been a house hold name in the uk for 20 years he's made many films and is currently appearing in one of the most popular tv shows ever made, house veiwed all over the world with a weekly average audience of 86million.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
